problem.p: Assume in blackjack aces always worth 11 and all face cards (jack, queen, king) worth 10. Given a shuffled deck of 52 cards:

ul.li: What is the probability that you draw 2 cards and they sum 21?
What is the probability that you draw 2 cards and they sum 10?
If you have drawn the 10 of clubs and 4 of hearts, and there are 50 cards left in the deck, what is the probability that the sum exceeds 21 when the third card is drawn?
